prompts.flat_lay:
Professional e-commerce flat lay photograph of Ron Dorff Organic Cotton Crochet Knit Shirt in Natural, 100% organic cotton.

COMPOSITION: Follow the line drawing guide for garment placement. IMPORTANT: Maintain realistic shirt proportions - the width-to-height ratio should match a natural short-sleeve button-up shirt. Do NOT stretch or elongate the garment vertically.

GARMENT DETAILS - MUST BE EXACT:
- BUTTONS: Exactly 5 buttons down the center placket. Count them: 1, 2, 3, 4, 5. No more, no less.
- EYELETS: Two small BLACK metal eyelets in the lower right area of the shirt (near the hem). The eyelets are BLACK/dark metal, not silver.
- COLLAR: Camp collar / Cuban collar style, neatly shaped and open.
- Ron Dorff label visible at the inside neckline.

STYLING: Shirt laid perfectly flat with relaxed, natural proportions. Sleeves spread naturally to the sides. Open-weave crochet knit texture visible throughout.

COLOR: Match the EXACT color from the input image - warm beige/sand tone, NOT bright white or cream. The "Natural" color is a muted, earthy beige with subtle warmth. Preserve the original color temperature.

LIGHTING: Professional soft studio lighting with even, diffused illumination. No harsh shadows. Do NOT overexpose or wash out the garment color.

BACKGROUND: Light warm gray studio surface. Clean, seamless backdrop.

High-end fashion e-commerce aesthetic. The shirt should look wide and relaxed, not tall and narrow.

LIGHTING: Professional soft studio lighting. Even illumination to show the black metal finish of the eyelets.

prompts.sleeves:
Detail shot of the sleeve construction on this crochet knit shirt.

WHAT TO PHOTOGRAPH:
- Short sleeve of the shirt, showing the full sleeve from shoulder seam to hem
- Open-weave crochet knit texture clearly visible
- Sleeve hem finishing/edge detail

COMPOSITION:
- Shirt laid flat, camera focused on ONE sleeve
- Top-down 45-degree angle
- Show the sleeve spread naturally to the side
- Include part of the shoulder seam for context

GARMENT DETAILS FROM INPUT IMAGE:
- Copy the EXACT open-weave crochet knit pattern from the input
- Same stitch pattern, same hole size, same texture
- Natural/beige color - warm sand tone, NOT white

STYLING: Sleeve laid flat and smooth, showing the relaxed fit and construction quality.

LIGHTING: BRIGHT professional e-commerce studio lighting. Clean, even, well-lit exposure. No dark shadows, no moody lighting. This should look like a bright, clean product photo - NOT dark or underexposed.

BACKGROUND: LIGHT warm gray studio surface - bright and clean, not dark.

- Top-down angle, fabric laid completely flat
- Close enough to see individual stitches and the weave pattern

- Match the EXACT crochet knit pattern from the input photo
- Same hole size, same stitch density, same weave structure
- This is 100% organic cotton with a distinctive open, airy weave

COLOR: Warm beige/sand "Natural" tone. Do NOT brighten to white or wash out the earthy warmth.
